*[[Underground]] *[[Berry Master]] *[[Dungeons]] |value = 100 {{Gem|Ground}} }} ==Description== The '''Earth Plate''' is a type of [[Underground|Underground Item]]. ==Details== The Earth Plate has a value of 100 [[Gems|Ground Gems]] {{Gem|Ground}} when sold. It can also be traded in Daily Deals. ==Acquisition== Earth Plates can be found in the [[Underground]], traded for with the [[Berry Master|Hoenn Berry Master]], and as Loot in [[Dungeons]]. ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/headâ€Ž|Underground Items}} {{LootItem|Mt Mortar|Epic}} {{LootItem|Victory Road Johto|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Rusturf Tunnel|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Granite Cave|Epic}} {{LootItem|Seafloor Cavern|Legendary}} {{LootItem|Oreburgh Gate|Epic}} {{LootItem|Wayward Cave|Epic}} {{LootItem|Hall of Origin|Epic}} {{LootItem|Relic Castle|Epic}} {{LootItem|Reflection Cave|Epic}} {{LootItem|Terminus Cave|Epic}} {{LootItem|Diglett's Tunnel|Epic}} {{LootItem|Exeggutor Island Hill|Epic}} {{LootItem|Galar Mine No. 2|Epic}} |} |} {{Underground Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Gems]]
